columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the HealthEvent.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services Availability Zone of the event.

columns.name: start_time
columns.description: The date and time that the event began.

columns.name: end_time
columns.description: The date and time that the event ended.

columns.name: event_scope_code
columns.description: This parameter specifies if the Health event is a public Amazon Web Services service event or an account-specific event.

columns.name: event_type_category
columns.description: A list of event type category codes. Possible values are issue, accountNotification, or scheduledChange.

columns.name: event_type_code
columns.description: The unique identifier for the event type.

columns.name: last_updated_time
columns.description: The most recent date and time that the event was updated.

columns.name: service
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services service that is affected by the event. For example, EC2, RDS.

columns.name: status_code
columns.description: The most recent status of the event. Possible values are open, closed, and upcoming.
